targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application"='HTTPBIN') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("mean") as avg FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application"='HTTPBIN' AND "statut"='ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT 100 * (sum("count") - sum("ok.count")) / sum("count") FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application"='HTTPBIN') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
